title: Bacon Wrapped Meatballs
directions: Combine the ground beef, eggs, olive oil, bread crumbs, minced Italian parsley, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Mix until well combined.
Take a section of the beef mix and roll until it is about the size of a golf ball.
Repeat 3 until all meatballs are finished.
Wrap the bacon around the circumference of the meatball. Once wrapped, pin the bacon down with a toothpick.
Place the bacon wrapped meatballs into a large skillet on high with some oil. Cook each side, 1 minute each.
